DOC.brief_summary: Purpose 1. To compare the performance of the two currently employed urinary acidifications tests in stone formers, the furosemide/fludrocortisone and ammonium chloride loading test. 2. To study the impact of polymorphisms in the genes ATP6V1B1, ATP6V0A4 and SLC4A1 on urinary acidification in stone formers.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Polymorphisms in the ATP6V1 Gene of the V-ATPase on the Development of Incomplete Distal Renal Tubular Acidosis
DOC.criteria: One or more episodes of nephrolithiasis Absence of informed consent All conditions affecting renal acidification Pregnancy Nursing
